headline: How The Verizon Communications (VZ) Investment Narrative Is Shifting As Analysts Rework Price Targets
summary: Verizon Communications has seen its modeled fair value price target shift slightly from US$49.34 to US$49.80, a small recalibration that still matters if you are tracking where analysts think the shares belong. Recent research shows some firms nudging targets up by roughly US$2 to US$4, while others trim by around US$2, reflecting different views on execution risk and how much investors may be willing to pay ahead of upcoming results. As you read on, you will see how these moves fit into the...
